text.password-hint: The password must consist of at least 8 characters
text.mail-subject: Your access token to your account
text.name: Name
text.user-has-no-videos: User {name} has not booked any videos

copy-link.text: Use the Copy button to save the link in your clipboard. You can then paste the link into an email using the Paste command ( Ctrl-V ). Next forward the mail to the client.

send-link.text:
Depending on the configuration of your browser, an email program starts when upon clicking special email links. If there is no email client starting up, jump to the next point.
Here is a Test Link:

test-magic-link.text: Test the Magic Link by clicking the Magic Link button. You will be logged out of your account and automatically logged in as {currentUserName} . To continue working later as {sessionUserName} , you'll have to log back into your account.
